textAfterTable: Bra Fitting With a bra on, wrap a tape measure snugly, but not too tightly, around your rib cage, just below your bust line. This is your band size (US/UK sizing uses inches). Then, wrap the tape measure around the fullest part of your bust. If the difference is: 1" / 2.5cm your cup size is A 2" / 5cm your cup size is B 3" / 7.5cm your cup size is C 4" / 10cm your cup size is D Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer In 2009, sisters Arin Robinson and Jessie Zinke fulfilled their childhood dream of designing a label together, launching Zinke lingerie. The label boasts a fresh, luxurious, mix-and-match approach to intimate apparel. Early-adopters of the popular peek-a-boo trend, Zinke pieces are meant to be layered, casually hinting at what lies underneath.
